text.section:
An applicant for a license shall:
Submit an application to the Secretary on the form that the Secretary requires; and
Pay to the Secretary an application fee established by the Secretary under § 2-104 of this article.

The application fee under this section shall be based on:
If the applicant has a manufacturing facility located in this State, the annual production of any frozen dessert or frozen dessert mix in this State; and
If the applicant has a manufacturing facility not located in this State, the annual sales of any frozen dessert or frozen dessert mix in this State.
For each license for which a person applies, the person shall submit a separate application and pay a separate application fee.

The application:
Shall be on the form that the Secretary requires; and
Shall include:
The location of the manufacturing plant at which the frozen dessert or frozen dessert mix is manufactured; and
Any brand name under which the frozen dessert or frozen dessert mix is to be sold.
